summary: Diff adds new IAX/DVSwitch connection fields (phoneToIaxConfirmed, codecType) to the stored connection type with backward-compatible defaults on load, and begins integrating these fields into the IAX/DVSwitch connect form and saved-configuration UI. However, the diff excerpt is truncated around the connect form UI and save logic, and the saved-configuration rendering is also truncated, so multiple UI/behavior acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the IAX / DVSwitch configuration form UI to use DVSwitch-style field order and English labels (Hostname, Port, Username, Password, Callsign, Node Number) while preserving load-on-mount and Save persistence.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows state variables in the desired order and loading existing values on mount, but the actual rendered form field order/labels and the Save persistence behavior are not visible in the truncated snippet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a "Phone to IAX connection" checkbox and block Save with an English validation message unless checked; persist the confirmation value.
missing_requirements.reason: State for phoneToIaxConfirmed is added and loaded from storage, but the diff excerpt does not show a checkbox labeled exactly "Phone to IAX connection", nor any Save-blocking/validation messaging logic tied to it, nor that it is included in the saved payload.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a "Codec Types" selector (ulaw/slin/adpcm) with a default selection; persist and restore the codec; show it in the Saved Configuration view.
missing_requirements.reason: codecType is added to the connection type and defaulted/restored on load, but the diff excerpt does not show the actual selector UI labeled "Codec Types", nor that Save persists the chosen codec, nor that the saved-configuration UI renders the codec value (the saved tab is truncated before showing it).

missing_requirements.requirement: Extend the IAX / DVSwitch saved-configuration display to include "Phone to IAX connection" as Yes/No and "Codec Types" while continuing to mask passwords.
missing_requirements.reason: The saved configuration tab computes phoneToIaxStatus and codecTypeDisplay and still masks passwords, but the snippet is truncated before showing whether these new fields are actually rendered in the card.
